faq.question: What network is VCoin on?
faq.answer: VCoin is deployed on Base (Ethereum L2) to ensure low fees and high speed.

faq.question: What is the maximum supply?
faq.answer: 100,000,000 VCOIN is the maximum supply. No more tokens can be created.

faq.question: Are there platform fees?
faq.answer: 1% of investments + 1% optional buyback/burn (configurable by governance).

faq.question: When will it be audited?
faq.answer: Smart contracts will be audited before mainnet launch by recognized firms.

faq.question: How does pricing work?
faq.answer: Price is determined by supply and demand on DEX/CEX. Oracles provide real-time feeds.

faq.question: Can I stake?
faq.answer: Yes, staking will be available to get priority in popular project allocations.
